request.description: This is a soft delete. The user is just disabled but you cannot create a new user with the same username. Use "Restore User" to undo.
This is a soft delete. The user is just disabled but you cannot create a new user with the same username. Use "Restore User" to undo.
Reset the user password by generatates and returns a new random password.

This request will send an email containing a secure time-bound link to the email address on record for the user. The link is served by Kinvey and is valid for twenty minutes from the time of the email. A link can be used for only one reset. Submitting the form will update the password for the user. The user will also receive a confirmation email when they complete the password reset.

This request will send an email containing a secure time-bound link to the email address on record for the user. The link is served by Kinvey and is valid for twenty minutes from the time of the email. A link can be used for only one reset. Submitting the form will update the password for the user. The user will also receive a confirmation email when they complete the password reset.
Manually initiate the email verification process for a user

When a user is in locked-down state, any requests that are authenticated with this user's credentials or that attempt to log-in the user will fail. Additionally, all auth tokens for the user will be destroyed. Since this is an administrative operation, only the master secret can be used to lock-down a user (or unlock that user if already locked-down).

query.description: If true, Google Cloud Storage URLs will use the https protocol instead of http
